section.10: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Aisha may Allah be pleased with her, that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) told Abu Bakr to lead the people in prayer. She said:"The Prophet was in front of Abu Bakr and he prayed sitting down, and Abu Bakr was leading the people in prayer, and the people were behind Abu Bakr
